trans-unit.source: Defines properties and methods for all activity designers that have a sequential vertical layout on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: 工作流设计图面上具有顺序垂直布局的所有活动设计器定义属性和方法。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The SequentialActivityDesigner and classes that inherit from it can contain child activity designers.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]SequentialActivityDesigner 和从其继承的类可以包含子活动设计器。

trans-unit.source: Their appearance on the workflow design surface is organized vertically, with child activities displayed on the surface of the SequentialActivityDesigner.
trans-unit.target: 工作流设计图面上的外观的顾客是垂直方式组织，SequentialActivityDesigner 面上显示的子活动。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> that allows the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"></xref> to adjust its UI for users who have disabilities.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref>这样<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"></xref>来为残障用户调整其 UI。

trans-unit.source: If the initial value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner> creates an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>.
trans-unit.target: 如果初始值为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>为空引用 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)，<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner>创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> to associate with the designer.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref>要与设计器关联。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"></xref> can be expanded and collapsed on the workflow designer surface.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"></xref>可以展开和折叠在工作流设计器图面上。

trans-unit.source: If CanExpandCollapse returns `true`, the designer renders an expand-collapse button on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: 如果 CanExpandCollapse 返回`true`，设计器上呈现一个展开-折叠按钮工作流设计图面。

trans-unit.source: If the parent designer of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner> is <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner>, CanExpandCollapse returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果的父设计器<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner>是<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner>，CanExpandCollapse 返回`false`。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Additionally, if the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner> is the root designer, CanExpandCollapse returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 此外，如果<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner>是根设计器中，CanExpandCollapse 返回`false`。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the designer can be expanded and collapsed on the workflow design surface; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果可以展开和折叠上工作流设计图面，则设计器，否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the designer is expanded on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在工作流设计图面上展开设计器。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"></xref> is expanded on the workflow design surface; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"></xref>在工作流设计图面上展开; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the first selectable object in the navigation order of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取的导航顺序中的第一个可选择对象<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that is the first selectable object in the designer navigation order.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>，它是设计器导航顺序中的第一个可选择对象。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of rectangles that bound the activity designer's connectors.
trans-unit.target: 返回限定了活动设计器的连接器边界的矩形数组。

trans-unit.source: If the current designer is not the active designer or if the designer is not expanded, GetConnectors returns an empty array.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前设计器不是有效的设计器或 GetConnectors 未展开设计器，返回一个空数组。

trans-unit.source: If there are no activity designers in the parent designer, GetConnectors returns an array of one rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 如果父设计器中不有任何活动设计器，GetConnectors 将返回一个矩形的数组。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> array that bounds the connectors.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>限定连接器边界的数组。

trans-unit.source: Returns array of rectangles that represent the valid drop locations within the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 返回表示中的有效放置位置的矩形数组<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that defines the x- and y-coordinates for the drop target.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref>定义 x 坐标和 y 坐标放置目标。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> array that represents the valid drop locations within the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>数组，表示中的有效放置位置<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns the first selectable object that follows the specified object in the navigation order of the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前的导航顺序中位于指定的对象后面的第一个可选择对象<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The current object in the navigation order.
trans-unit.target: 导航顺序中的当前对象。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerNavigationDirection"></xref> enumeration value that determines the navigation order of the designer.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerNavigationDirection"> </xref>确定设计器的导航顺序的枚举值。

trans-unit.source: The first selectable that follows the obj parameter in the navigation order of the .
trans-unit.target: 第一个可选择后面 obj 的导航顺序中的参数 。

trans-unit.source: Gets a read-only collection of glyphs that are associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取与关联的标志符号的只读集合<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph"></xref> read-only collection that contains all of the glyphs to display on the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph"> </xref>包含所有要在上显示的标志符号的只读集合<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text to display when the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"></xref> contains no other activity designers.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置时要显示的文本<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"></xref>不包含任何其他活动设计器。

trans-unit.source: The HelpText property value is displayed on the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner> surface when it contains no child activity designers.
trans-unit.target: 上显示的方框属性值<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner>时它不包含任何子活动设计器图面。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the text to display on the designer surface.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，包含要在设计器图面上显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: Gets the rectangle that serves as the bounds for the text displayed by the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.HelpText*> property.
trans-unit.target: 获取用作由显示的文本的边界的矩形<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.HelpText*>属性。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.HelpText*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that serves as the bounds for the text displayed by the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.HelpText*> property.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>用作显示的文本的边界<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.HelpText*>属性。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.HelpText*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the height and width of the text to display in the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"></xref> when it contains no child activity designers.
trans-unit.target: 获取的高度和宽度的中显示的文本<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"></xref>时，它包含任何子活动设计器。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that defines the height and width of the text displayed by <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"></xref> when it contains no child activity designers.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> ，它定义的高度和宽度的显示的文本<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"></xref>时，它包含任何子活动设计器。

trans-unit.source: By default HelpTextSize is set to a newly initialized <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下 HelpTextSize 是设置为新初始化<xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns information about the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"></xref> at the specified point on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: 返回有关的信息<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"></xref>工作流设计图面上指定点处。

trans-unit.source: The information returned by HitTest is based on the point on the workflow design surface that was passed to it.
trans-unit.target: HitTest 返回的信息基于传递给它的工作流设计图面上的点。

trans-unit.source: It includes the activity designer associated with the point, the bounds of that activity designer, the exact hit location of the point, any selectable objects associated with the point, and any user data associated with the point.
trans-unit.target: 它包括使用点、 该活动设计器的边界、 在点、 点时，关联的任何可选择对象和与点关联的任何用户数据的确切命中的位置关联的活动设计器。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> location on the workflow design surface from which to gather information.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref>从中收集信息的工作流设计图面上的位置。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"></xref> that contains information about the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"> </xref> ，其中包含有关的信息<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the designer by using the specified activity.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用指定的活动初始化设计器。

trans-unit.source: Initialize assigns a value for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.HelpText%2A> property that is displayed on the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner> if it does not contain any child designers.
trans-unit.target: 初始化赋值为<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.HelpText%2A>显示的属性<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner>如果它不包含任何子设计器。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.HelpText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> with which to initialize the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref>用来初始化<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the last selectable object in the navigation order of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取的导航顺序中的最后一个可选择对象<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> that is the last selectable object in the designer navigation order.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>，它是设计器导航顺序中的最后一个可选择对象。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Performs layout tasks to position visual cues and child designers on the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 执行位置视觉提示和子设计器上布局任务<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"></xref> that contains the layout arguments.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"> </xref>包含布局自变量。

trans-unit.source: e contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: e包含空引用 ( 在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: Sets the size of the visual cues on the designers contained within the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 中包含的设计器上设置的视觉提示大小<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"></xref> that contains the layout arguments.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"> </xref>包含布局自变量。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that contains the new size settings for <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref>包含的新大小设置<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Draws the visual representation of activity at design time.
trans-unit.target: 绘制在设计时的可视表示形式活动。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs"></xref> that contains the drawing arguments.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs"> </xref>包含绘制自变量。
